title: Is The World Getting Better Or Worse? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/4/18
itunes:title: Is The World Getting Better Or Worse? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/4/18
description:
George Noory and psychologist Steven Pinker discuss his research into how people form their view of the world and current events, and whether their opinions of negative events in the world are exaggerated compared to reality.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
